name: Komisijska-Prodani artikli po dobavnicah
query:
SELECT
  SubQuery.Dobavnica AS "Dobavnica:Link/Delivery Note:100",
  SubQuery.item_code AS "Item:Link/Item:150",
  SubQuery.`Delivered Qty`AS `Delivered qty:Float:100`,
  SubQuery_1.`Billed Qty` as "Billed qty:Float:80",
SUM(SubQuery.`Delivered Qty` - IfNULL(SubQuery_1.`Billed Qty`,0)) AS `Pending Qty:Float:100`,
  SubQuery.rate as "cena:Currency:60",
  SubQuery.against_sales_order as "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:120",
  SubQuery.Naročilnica AS "#naročila:60",
  SubQuery.po_date AS "Datum naročila:Date:100",
  SubQuery.posting_date AS "Datum dobavnice:Date:100"
FROM (SELECT
    SUM(`tabSales Invoice Item`.qty) AS `Billed Qty`,
    `tabSales Invoice Item`.item_code,
    `tabSales Invoice Item`.dn_detail
  FROM `tabSales Invoice Item`
  GROUP BY `tabSales Invoice Item`.item_code,
           `tabSales Invoice Item`.dn_detail) SubQuery_1
  RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT
      `tabDelivery Note Item`.item_code,
      SUM(`tabDelivery Note Item`.qty) AS `Delivered Qty`,
      `tabDelivery Note Item`.parent AS Dobavnica,
      `tabDelivery Note Item`.name,
      `tabDelivery Note Item`.rate,
      `tabDelivery Note Item`.against_sales_order,
      `tabSales Order`.po_no AS Naročilnica,
      `tabDelivery Note Item`.creation,
      `tabSales Order`.po_date,
      `tabDelivery Note`.posting_date
    FROM `tabDelivery Note Item`
      INNER JOIN `tabItem Group`
        ON `tabDelivery Note Item`.item_group = `tabItem Group`.name
      INNER JOIN `tabSales Order`
        ON `tabSales Order`.name = `tabDelivery Note Item`.against_sales_order
      INNER JOIN `tabDelivery Note`
        ON `tabDelivery Note`.name = `tabDelivery Note Item`.parent
    WHERE `tabDelivery Note Item`.docstatus = 1
    AND `tabItem Group`.parent_item_group = "komisijska prodaja"
    GROUP BY `tabDelivery Note Item`.item_code,
             `tabDelivery Note Item`.parent,
             `tabDelivery Note Item`.name,
             `tabDelivery Note Item`.rate,
             `tabDelivery Note Item`.against_sales_order,
             `tabSales Order`.po_no,
             `tabDelivery Note Item`.creation,
             `tabSales Order`.po_date,
             `tabDelivery Note`.posting_date
    ORDER BY Dobavnica DESC) SubQuery
    ON SubQuery_1.item_code = SubQuery.item_code
    AND SubQuery.name = SubQuery_1.dn_detail
GROUP BY SubQuery.item_code,
         SubQuery_1.item_code,
         SubQuery.Dobavnica,
         SubQuery.rate,
         SubQuery.against_sales_order,
         SubQuery_1.`Billed Qty`,
         SubQuery.Naročilnica,
         SubQuery.po_date,
         SubQuery.posting_date
ORDER BY SubQuery.Dobavnica, Dobavnica DESC
